title: Here's What SOAD's 'Chop Suey' Would Sound Like If It Was A Ghost Song [News]
text:
Here's What SOAD's 'Chop Suey' Would Sound Like If It Was a Ghost Song Papa Serj? Posted 8 hours ago 14 
Mr. Anthony Vincent of Ten Second Songs presented an interesting rendition of SOAD classic " Chop Suey ," offering his take on what the tune would sound like if it was actually a Ghost song. 
The musician noted: "Not gonna lie... I kinda want to start a doom metal band now." 
You can check out the clip in the embedded player below.
